definitions.definition: To extract and present the main ideas or substance , or the most essential parts of (a document , piece of writing , etc.); to abridge , to summarize .
To talk idly ; chat ; also, to gossip .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To extract and present the main ideas or substance , or the most essential parts of (a document , piece of writing , etc.); to abridge , to summarize .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , Nigeria ) To talk idly ; chat ; also, to gossip .
